bibl.title: with a chapter by Nettie K. Adams, Qasr Ibrim. The Earlier Medieval Period.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. The architectural record. - 3. The artifactual record. - 4. The textual record. - 5. Synthesis. - Appendices: A. Calculated dates for early Christian pottery wares found at Qasr Ibrim; - B. Synoptic table of proveniences and dates; - C. Comprehensive table of early and classic Christian finds.
bibl.seg: Adams William Y., with a chapter by Nettie K. Adams, Qasr Ibrim. The Earlier Medieval Period. (Excavation Memoirs. 89.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2010, 4°, xiv-314 pp., tabl., 67 figg. et 5 pll. coul. ISBN 978-0-85698-191-3. £85.

1. Introduction. - 2. The architectural record. - 3. The artifactual record. - 4. The textual record. - 5. Synthesis. - Appendices: A. Calculated dates for early Christian pottery wares found at Qasr Ibrim; - B. Synoptic table of proveniences and dates; - C. Comprehensive table of early and classic Christian finds.
